word:
"I have been instructed to say, The Lord would not have my mind thus employed. I have written something on the meaning of the words, "I", "we", and "us" in the Testimonies. This point is, as it were, a man of straw, set up in the imagination of some who have been sowing tares." 


                               (Signed) 


                                        Ellen G. White 


            (From Doctor Paulson's Collection) 


                                                              127.
